channel.title: Github on Nomad's reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Github on Nomad's reflections

item.title: Migrating wordpress blog to hugo and hosting it with GitHub Pages
item.description: Two weeks ago my blog was hosted on a 10$/mo vps instance in DigitalOcean, powered by a couple docker containers, running an ever dynamic Wordpress platform. Now it’s completely static, served from GitHub Pages servers free. What follows is a small experience reco/guide on how to make this happen.
